# disconnect()

**Instance Method**

Disconnects the local player from the match.

## Declaration

```swift
func disconnect()
```

## Discussion

Call this method before ending a match.

## Finishing the match

- **rematch(completionHandler:)**: Creates a new match with the players from an existing match.

items.description: Creates a new match with the players from an existing match.
items.name: rematch(completionHandler:)

title: disconnect()
